bibdata.title: IEEE Standard Conformance Test Procedures for Equipment Interconnecting Distributed Resources with Electric Power Systems
Amendment 1
IEEE Standard Conformance Test Procedures for Equipment Interconnecting Distributed Resources with Electric Power Systems - Amendment 1

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This amendment was prepared in response to IEEE Std 1547a(TM), Amendment 1 to IEEE Std 1547(TM)-2003 providing revisions to Clause 4.1.1 Voltage regulation, Clause 4.2.4 Frequency, and Clause 4.2.3 Voltage.

This amendment was prepared in response to IEEE Std 1547a(TM), Amendment 1 to IEEE Std 1547(TM)-2003 providing revisions to Clause 4.1.1 Voltage regulation, Clause 4.2.4 Frequency, and Clause 4.2.3 Voltage.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
